content: The Democrats simply don’t have the votes to obstruct Trump the way the Republicans obstructed Obama. And the Republicans won’t “keep their powder dry” WRT changing the rules when the Dems try to use parliamentary tactics to slow down Trump’s nominees. The Dems should fight the nominations in committee, accept that they’re outvoted, and move on to other matters. Theater for the sake of theater impresses only the most deranged of the Dem base but otherwise makes them look as though they’re trying to make the country ungovernable. Considering how the Republicans behaved during the Obama administration, that may seem unfair. But it’s true.
